div.p: ( a) Points mark the placement of caves with known populations of any of the species of the studied lineage. In yellow, areas with karstic substratum, i.e. suitable to have deep subterranean environment. In red, caves with predicted suitable current conditions when the thermal niche of the species was estimated from the LGM temperatures ( b) and those predicted to have suitable conditions in 2080 under the B2 ( c) and A2 ( d) scenarios when the thermal niche was estimated from current temperatures. Maps were created using ArcGIS software by Esri (Environmental Systems Resource Institute, ArcMap 10.1, ( www.esri.com).
